payload.description: Modify EvidenceEditorContext.jsx to add upload queue and undo support. Replace uploadingBlocks Set with uploadQueue state from useUploadQueue hook. Add deletedBlocks state array for undo functionality. Add deleteBlockWithUndo() and restoreBlock() methods. Integrate with useUploadQueue for connectivity-aware uploads.
payload.context: Import useUploadQueue from hooks. uploadQueue replaces simple Set. deletedBlocks stores { ...block, deletedAt: Date.now() }. deleteBlockWithUndo triggers UndoToast, stores block for 5 seconds. restoreBlock recovers from deletedBlocks array. Provide uploadQueue, isOnline, pendingCount, failedCount in context.
